alert.note: Alert for Benton; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 6:35PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Linn and central Benton Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 635 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keystone, or 11 miles southwest of Vinton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Hiawatha, Robins, Center Point, Atkins, Palo, Shellsburg, Newhall, Van Horne, Keystone, Toddville, and Pleasant Creek State Recreation Area. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 25 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
